backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining radio/network types, user profiles, signaling messages, and profile access functions with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two navigation‑related fixes to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions summarizing major frontend components and pages and their recent behavior updates.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-23-prev: Promotion record template for Version 23 detailing preview verification steps and emphasizing no‑change deployment rules.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-30-prev: Draft promotion record for Version 30 outlining required verification checklists and an attestation of no code or config changes.
frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-product: Runbook describing the process and verification requirements for promoting a preview build to production without modifications.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets PWA metadata and loads the main React bundle.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app name, icons, colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with simple styling and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, offline fallback, and cache cleanup using a network-first strategy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router setup with authentication-gated routes and a post-login redirect component.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays error details and provides reset and session-clear actions.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Top-level layout with header, navigation, footer, and auth-aware nav item visibility.
Audio input level meter component rendering segmented visual levels based on microphone activity.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedFlo: Error fallback component for authenticated flows, showing details and offering retry or session reset actions.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper that manages Internet Identity login, actor initialization, errors, and session clearing before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/ColorAccentPanel: Simple styled panel wrapper with neutral theming for grouping UI content.
Generic page header component displaying title, optional subtitle, and icon with neutral styling.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceConn: Form for configuring Digital Voice connections, loading saved settings, applying presets, and validating fields across multiple modes.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceSave: Displays the saved Digital Voice configuration, highlights missing fields, and shows gateway readiness status with edit options.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Directory browser for networks and talkgroups with filtering, search, mode selection, and favorites management.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Form for configuring IAX/DVSwitch or AllStar connections, supporting presets, validation, and saving connection settings.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchSaved: Displays saved IAX/DVSwitch connection details or a warning if none exist, allowing masked password display and optional editing.
frontend/src/components/InstallAppAction: Shows a PWA install button with iOS-specific instructions and triggers installation when allowed.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout flow with error handling, retry, and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Renders a list of recent radio transmissions with metadata or shows loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages locally stored personal network directory entries with add and delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new users to enter callsign, name, and license acknowledgement before saving their profile.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Implements a push‑to‑talk button with press/hold detection and transmit state callbacks.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Displays a status badge showing connection, transmission, or reception state with corresponding icon and styling.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Renders a warning alert requiring users to acknowledge they have a valid radio license, linking to settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Like useActor but with enhanced logging, retry logic, and controlled invalidation to handle initialization errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Tracks microphone audio level in real time using an analyser node, providing level and activation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the current user profile through the actor with retry and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Retrieves and toggles favorite networks using actor calls with query invalidation and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, state management, and AuthClient initialization through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Handles push‑to‑talk microphone recording using MediaRecorder, returning recording state, errors, and callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Fetches builtin networks and provides simple client-side search filtering via actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update real-time "now hearing" transmission data using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Defines connection types and helpers for storing, identifying, and validating preferred network connections.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Handles PWA install prompts, installability detection, and user-triggered installation flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Provides a mutation hook to perform QRZ callsign lookups through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRememberLoginPrefe: Manages a persisted user preference for remembering login state across sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Fetches the caller's user role and admin status using react-query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: Implements WebRTC push-to-talk logic including room joining, signaling, media handling, and gateway support.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and a custom dark theme using OKLCH color variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Renders the About/Compliance page describing PTTStar, licensing requirements, and creator information.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Displays live activity transmissions with auto-refresh and a NowHearing list inside a styled panel.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Handles connection setup, saved configurations, quick presets, and switching between IAX and Digital Voice connection forms.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Provides network and talkgroup browsing, personal entries management, and navigation to PTT after selecting a connection.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing and onboarding page explaining PTTStar requirements and guiding users to core app features.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Manages WebRTC PTT sessions, room joining, transmit controls, and validation for digital voice and BrandMeister connections.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: User profile management page supporting editing callsign and identifiers, license acknowledgement, and login preferences.
frontend/src/utils/digitalVoiceGatewayCl: WebRTC signaling client that connects to a Digital Voice gateway via WebSocket, sending join metadata and handling SDP/ICE messages.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Generates normalized room keys and labels based on various connection types, reflectors, talkgroups, and metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, keyframes, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and feature requests related to fixing a post-login navigation crash.
